column4: ok guys, i was defending Unity before because i assumed that Canonical knows what it's doing more than us hackers. but after trying it with my friend who is a new linux user since yesterday and my mum: i hate it, the entire geek community hates it, my mum hates it, my friend hates it.
linux mint has overtaken ubuntu on distrowatch
but after testing with people, i cannot ignore the results
and get a grip, this channel isn't for complain about it.
a complaint would be blaa blaa i didn't get my money's worth
i am switching to linux mint or arch in the future.
instead of plugging your ears to the community and going lalalalala, drop unity. it is a failed project.
derp, distro is broken, fix it yourself
move it to offtopic, your rant isn't topic here.
exactly, go to offtopic for that.
